description.raw: This changes the gazebo plugins to use the `MODULE` keyword to cmake's `add_library()` function instead of `SHARED` as discussed in #800. This changes the suffix on OS X from `.dylib` to `.so`, so the previous hack of replacing `.so` with `.dylib` when loading plugins on OS X is changed to deprecated behavior. For gazebo8, `.dylib` plugins will continue to load if a `.so` is not found, but a warning message will print to the console. The `test/plugins` folder is currently retaining the `SHARED` keyword to provide a test case for this functionality but should be changed to use `MODULE` when the deprecated functionality is removed.
description.html: This changes the gazebo plugins to use the MODULE keyword to cmake's add_library() function instead of SHARED as discussed in #800. This changes the suffix on OS X from .dylib to .so, so the previous hack of replacing .so with .dylib when loading plugins on OS X is changed to deprecated behavior. For gazebo8, .dylib plugins will continue to load if a .so is not found, but a warning message will print to the console. The test/plugins folder is currently retaining the SHARED keyword to provide a test case for this functionality but should be changed to use MODULE when the deprecated functionality is removed.

title.raw: Build plugin libraries as MODULE instead of SHARED
